q_ch: 2024年5月1日后才开始的裁剪任务有哪些？
q_en: What are the cutting tasks that will only start after May 1, 2024?

steps.description: To find the cutting tasks that will only start after May 1, 2024, we need to query the cutting_tasks table for tasks with a start_time greater than May 1, 2024.

response:
Sure thing! Here are the cutting tasks that will only start after May 1, 2024:

| Task ID | Start Time          | End Time            | Working Group ID | Order Product ID | Produced WIP ID | Planned Number | Completed Number | Status |
|---------|---------------------|---------------------|------------------|------------------|-----------------|----------------|------------------|--------|
| 31      | May 10, 2024        | May 26, 2024        | 3                | 31               | 8               | 260            | 260              | 1      |
| 32      | June 1, 2024        | June 17, 2024       | 2                | 32               | 8               | 150            | 120              | 1      |
| 33      | June 25, 2024       | July 17, 2024       | 3                | 33               | 10              | 120            | 0                | 0      |
| 34      | June 30, 2024       | July 10, 2024       | 4                | 34               | 2               | 330            | 0                | 0      |

These tasks are all set to kick off after May 1, 2024. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! 😊
